channel.title: [PI] chaotic crossbow
channel.description: I have been adding a fully working chaotic crossbow(with the bolt specs n stuff). But the crossbow never hits anything higher than a 20. May i ask why is that? The range bonus are added, i've made it so it would be like rune c'bow but rune c'bow still hits higher.

item.title: [PI] chaotic crossbow
item.dc:creator: @Pkor159 Pkor159
item.description:
@Pkor159 wrote:

I have been adding a fully working chaotic crossbow(with the bolt specs n stuff). But the crossbow never hits anything higher than a 20. May i ask why is that? The range bonus are added, i’ve made it so it would be like rune c’bow but rune c’bow still hits higher.

Read full topic
